mapper.select: select one.id, one.pname, one.parentid, one.grade, one.media_type, one.start_time, one.end_time, one.orderby, one.course_id, one.course_pub_id, tow.id, tow.pname, tow.parentid, tow.grade, tow.media_type, tow.start_time, tow.end_time, tow.orderby, tow.course_id, tow.course_pub_id, media.media_fileName, media.id, media.media_id from teachplan one inner join teachplan tow on one.id=tow.parentid left join teachplan_media media on media.teachplan_id=tow.id where one.parentid=0 and one.course_id=#{courseId} order by one.orderby, tow.orderby
